CustomField.formula:
IF( IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, First_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 5, First_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 10, First_GAD7_Score__c < 16), 2, NULL))) = IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 5, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 10, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 16), 2, NULL))), "Stable",
IF( IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, First_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 5, First_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 10, First_GAD7_Score__c < 16), 2, NULL))) < IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 5, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 10, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 16), 2, NULL))), "Worsened",
IF( IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, First_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 5, First_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(First_GAD7_Score__c > 10, First_GAD7_Score__c < 16), 2, NULL))) > IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c >= 0, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 6), 0,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 5, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 11), 1,IF(AND(Last_GAD7_Score__c > 10, Last_GAD7_Score__c < 22), 2,NULL))), "Improved", null ) ) )
CustomField.label: GAD-7 Improvement Indicator
